meanings.definition: Any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink to maintain life and growth.
meanings.sent1: Healthy foods like fruits and vegetables are important for our well-being.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy trying different foods from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The foods at the party were so delicious that everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking shows in the way she prepares foods with care and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The colorful display of foods at the market was a feast for the eyes.

meanings.definition: Any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue.
meanings.sent1: Protein-rich foods like chicken and fish help in muscle growth.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper ensures the animals are fed with the right foods for their health.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored nuts as if they were precious foods for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like comforting foods for the soul during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's diet consisted of energy-boosting foods to enhance performance.
